mapper.update: update pbc_rate_loanbal t set t.usdamt = round(t.ioubalamt * trunc((select c.rate from tempcurrate c where c.intcur = t.currencycode and c.yyyymm = #{yyyymm}) / (select c1.rate from tempcurrate c1 where c1.intcur = 'USD' and c1.yyyymm = #{yyyymm}), 10) / (select c2.ratebasic from tempcurrate c2 where c2.intcur = t.currencycode and c2.yyyymm = #{yyyymm}),2) where t.currencycode not in ('CNY') and t.reportdate = #{strdate}

update pbc_rate_depositbal t set t.usdamt = round(t.balamt * trunc((select c.rate from tempcurrate c where c.intcur = t.currencycode and c.yyyymm = #{yyyymm}) / (select c1.rate from tempcurrate c1 where c1.intcur = 'USD' and c1.yyyymm = #{yyyymm}), 10) / (select c2.ratebasic from tempcurrate c2 where c2.intcur = t.currencycode and c2.yyyymm = #{yyyymm}),2) where t.currencycode not in ('CNY') and t.reportdate = #{strdate}
mapper.select: select temp.productstypecode ,sum(cnt) as cnt ,sum(temp.lbal) as lbal ,temp.currencycode from ( select substr(t.productstypecode, 2, 2) as productstypecode, count(*) as cnt, (case when t.currencycode = 'CNY' then sum(t.ioubalamt) / 10000 else sum(t.usdamt) / 10000 end) as lbal, (case when t.currencycode='CNY' then 'CNY' else 'USD' end) as currencycode from pbc_rate_loanbal t where t.reportdate = #{strdate} group by substr(t.productstypecode,2,2),t.currencycode ) temp group by temp.productstypecode,temp.currencycode

select temp.productstypecode ,sum(cnt) as cnt ,sum(temp.lbal) as lbal ,temp.currencycode from ( select substr(t.productstypecode, 2, 2) as productstypecode, (case when t.currencycode = 'CNY' then sum(t.balamt) / 10000 else sum(t.usdamt) / 10000 end) as lbal, count(*) as cnt, (case when t.currencycode='CNY' then 'CNY' else 'USD' end) as currencycode from pbc_rate_depositbal t where t.reportdate=#{strdate} group by substr(t.productstypecode, 2, 2), t.currencycode ) temp group by temp.productstypecode,temp.currencycode

select temp.productstypecode ,sum(cnt) as cnt ,sum(temp.lbal) as lbal ,temp.currencycode from ( select substr(t.productstypecode, 2, 2) as productstypecode, count(*) as cnt, (case when t.currencycode = 'CNY' then sum(case when t.LOANSENDRECVCODE = '1' then t.ioubalamt else -t.ioubalamt end) / 10000 else sum(case when t.LOANSENDRECVCODE = '1' then t.usdamt else -t.usdamt end)/ 10000 end) as lbal, (case when t.currencycode = 'CNY' then 'CNY' else 'USD' end) as currencycode from pbc_rate_loandetl t where t.reportdate = #{strdate} group by substr(t.productstypecode, 2, 2), t.currencycode ) temp group by temp.productstypecode,temp.currencycode

select temp.productstypecode ,sum(cnt) as cnt ,sum(temp.lbal) as lbal ,temp.currencycode from ( select substr(t.productstypecode, 2, 2) as productstypecode, count(*) as cnt, (case when t.currencycode = 'CNY' then sum(case when t.depositflag = '1' then t.amt else - t.amt end) / 10000 else sum(case when t.depositflag = '1' then t.usdamt else - t.usdamt end)/ 10000 end) as lbal, (case when t.currencycode = 'CNY' then 'CNY' else 'USD' end) as currencycode from pbc_rate_depositdetl t where t.productstypecode <> '011' and t.reportdate = #{strdate} group by substr(t.productstypecode, 2, 2), t.currencycode ) temp group by temp.productstypecode,temp.currencycode
